entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 10:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: NW 31 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
